snippet.title: First Dwarf - Official Trailer | Future Games Show 2024
snippet.description:
Check out the new gameplay trailer for First Dwarf, an action RPG full of exploration, base building, and mech combat. Play in solo or co op as you defend your village, search the unknown with airships, and battle dragons.

First Dwarf is out in early access on PC in June 2024, with a demo available now.
